pages.text: $(li)The Pumpkin Fields is a biome where you can harvest a lot of Pumpkins.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find common Pumpkins, Large Pumpkings, Maple Trees, Red and Brown Mushrooms.

$(li)Some animals like Hummingbirds and Raccoons can be found here too.$(br)$(li)On the night, You can see a funny variation of the Zombie, a Zombie that is wearing a Pumpkin on the head.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Pumpkin Fields$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
